data.oai_dc:dc: Eremophila allelic phenotype dataset in COLONY-required format

The Eremophila glabra spp. glabra allelic phenotype dataset recoded for use with COLONY (Jones OR, Wang J (2002) COLONY: a program for parentage and sibship inference from multilocus genotype data. Molecular Ecology Resources, 10(3), 551–555.). Unzips to create a folder, 'COLONY_data_files', with content.
